segments.text: Well Rebecca , is there anything else you need to know for now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think so , Mr . Parsons . I think you have covered all the main points for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay well listen , here is my business card with my mobile number . If any other questions spring to mind don ’ t hesitate to contact me . Of course you can also call Miss Childs too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Rmm , when can I expect to hear from you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we are finishing the shortlist interviews tomorrow , so we will certainly have a decision made by early next week . Miss Childs will call you to discuss more on Monday or Tuesday . How does that sound ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds perfect . Thank you very much for taking the time to speak to me Mr . Parsons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The pleasure ’ s all mine , Rebecca .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope to hear from you very soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . Thanks for coming Rebecca . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
